org.apache.flink.types

Interface Value

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IOReadableWritable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CopyableValue<T>, Key<T>, NormalizableKey<T>, ResettableValue<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroBaseValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.BooleanListValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.BooleanMapValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.DoubleListValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.DoubleMapValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.FloatListValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.FloatMapValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.IntListValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.IntMapValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.LongListValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.LongMapValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.StringListValue, AvroRecordInputFormat.StringMapValue, BooleanValue, ByteValue, CharValue, DoubleValue, FloatValue, IntValue, ListValue, LongValue, MapValue, NullValue, Pair, Record, ShortValue, StringRecord, StringValue, SUser, WritableComparableWrapper, WritableWrapper

    public interface Value
extends IOReadableWritable, Serializable
    Basic value interface for types that act as serializable values.

    This interface extends IOReadableWritable and requires to implement the serialization of its value.

    See Also:
    IOReadableWritable

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.flink.core.io.IOReadableWritable

        read, write
